brand.description: The most advanced IELTS preparation platform powered by AI and expert teaching.

header.title: Let’s tailor your IELTS prep
header.subtitle: Three quick questions so we can personalise mocks, reminders, and feedback.

band.title: Target band
band.description: What score are you aiming for?

band.helper: You can update this any time from your profile.
band.tip: Most universities ask for 6.5–7.0. Aim 0.5 higher to give yourself a buffer on test day.

date.helper: Not sure yet? Leave blank and we’ll suggest a four-week ramp-up.
date.tip: We’ll pace mocks and AI-evaluated writing tasks to help you peak at the right time.

whatsapp.optInDescription: 2–3 gentle reminders per week with study prompts and quick wins. You can opt out any time.
whatsapp.helper: We’ll only use this for study reminders. Standard carrier charges may apply.
whatsapp.emailFallback: Prefer email? No problem — you can enable WhatsApp reminders later from Settings › Notifications.

errors.loadProfile: We couldn’t load your profile right now. Please refresh and try again.
errors.notAuthenticated: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
errors.saveGeneric: We couldn’t save your changes right now. Try again in a moment.
errors.invalidPhone: Enter a valid phone number in international format (e.g. +14155552671).
errors.skip: Unable to skip onboarding. Please try again.

page.title: Your study plan
page.subtitle: Keep a daily rhythm to build momentum for your IELTS goal.

sidebar.title: Need a change?
sidebar.description: Plans adapt as you complete tasks. You can always regenerate a fresh schedule from the presets below.

balanced.title: Balanced focus
balanced.description: Four weeks of daily IELTS tasks evenly split across all skills.

speaking.title: Speaking boost
speaking.description: Two-week plan focused on speaking drills and writing prompts.

listening.title: Listening sprint
listening.description: One-week reset with intensive listening practice.

toast.signInRequired: Please sign in to create a study plan.

planReady.title: Plan ready
planReady.description: Your new study plan is live. Start with today’s tasks!

emptyState.title: Create your study plan
emptyState.description: Pick a quick preset to fill your calendar instantly. You can customise tasks later.

actions.autoAdjust: Plans auto-adjust after you complete a day.

emptyState.streakNote: Your daily streak starts counting after you complete the first task in your plan.

lite.title: Lite reset (2 weeks)
lite.description: Ease back in with short daily sessions and vocabulary refreshers.

focus.title: Balanced focus (4 weeks)
focus.description: Structured mix of all four modules with weekly review checkpoints.

intensive.title: Intensive push (6 weeks)
intensive.description: Longer study blocks and extra mocks for a final exam sprint.

planCard.noTasks: No tasks scheduled for this day.

hints.focus: Stay focused and complete the task

page.title: Saved items
page.subtitle: All of your bookmarked lessons, practice sets, and AI feedback in one place. Open items to resume where you left off or remove them when you’re done.

authRequired.title: Sign in to view saved items
authRequired.description: Bookmarks sync with your account so you can return to them anytime.

errors.loadFailed: We couldn’t load your saved items right now. Please refresh and try again.
errors.generic: Something went wrong while loading your saved items. Please try again.

empty.title: You haven’t saved anything yet
empty.description: Bookmark practice passages, vocab lists, and AI feedback to revisit them faster.
